entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 14 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Clearing before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to 14 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:22 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:22 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:22 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
